Cisplatin is often used as part of combination chemotherapy regimens
 for various types of lung cancer, including non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC) 
and small cell lung cancer (SCLC). 
It may be used before surgery (neoadjuvant therapy), 
after surgery (adjuvant therapy), or in advanced stages of the disease.
disease_interaction:
Infections,
Hearing loss,
Myelosuppression,
Peripheral neuropathy,
Renal dysfunction,
Hemolytic anemia,
Ocular toxicity,

Description: Docetaxel is a chemotherapy medication commonly used in the treatment of lung cancer.

Description:
Etopophos, also known as Etoposide Phosphate, is a chemotherapy medication 
primarily used in the treatment of small cell lung cancer
adverse_effect:
1.lowered blood cell count
2.increasing the risk of infections
3.anemia, and bleeding.
